thread.title: One look could kill ya… “Mack” (6 Photos)
thread.title_full: One look could kill ya… “Mack” (6 Photos)

author: Rick
title: One look could kill ya… “Mack” (6 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Richard “Mack” Machowicz was a bad-a**. He was a Navy SEAL for 11 years, where he served with both TEAM ONE and TWO. 2 
In addition, he qualified as a Naval Special Warfare (NSW) Scout/Sniper and became a certified instructor at the NSW Combat Fighting Instructor Course. 3 
After serving he would go on to host 3 TV shows: -“Future Weapons” on The Discovory Channel -“Weapons That Changed the World” on The Military Channel -“Deadliest Warrior” on Spike TV 4 
In 2015 he was diagnosed with stage-four brain cancer. Yesterday at the age of 51, his final battle came to an end. 
Before his TV fame, in 2002 he wrote the “Unleash the Warrior Within”. Final words come from Richard “Mack” Machowicz’s book, “In the end, we will all die. There is no way to get around that fact.” 5 
He was a loving father of two daughters and to his beautiful wife Mandy. Advertisement
